'''''Relaxation Therapy''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete all three versions of the [[Daily Commission]] ''[[Doctor's Orders]]'' and do an additional favor for each patient.
